welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Luis Rio Colorado
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Luis Rio Colorado! Get ready to experience the warmth and charm of our city, known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yuma International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yuma International Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours.
